FPS Monitoring Script

Author: Dylan Plecki (Naught) Version: 1.0.2.1 - v1.0 RC b1

Description

Monitors and displays FPS of the server and clients on a regular interval with a silent hint in this format: Local FPS: minFPS - avgFPS Server FPS: minFPS - avgFPS / count Headless FPS: avgMinFPS - avgAvgFPS / count Client FPS: avgMinFPS - avgAvgFPS / count This script can be loaded and executed on any machine, without a need to install anything on the others.

Syntax

call FPSMON_fnc_monitor; // Turns off script delayInt call FPSMON_fnc_monitor; // Turns on/off script with delay [delayInt] call FPSMON_fnc_monitor; // Turns on/off script with delay

Requirements

Arma 3 1.0 Arma 2 OA 1.62 CBA A2/OA/A3 1.0
